EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Kevlar® Gloves
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Selecting Kevlar® Gloves
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar®.
DuPont® Kevlar® is available in continuous filament yarn, cut staple fiber, pulp and some roll goods forms. Most of these products are sold to converters who make fabrics, ropes and cables, composites or other high strength and high performance products for use by finished goods manufacturers
Most accidents can be avoided. And here safety is crucial, Kevlar® performance technology really makes a difference. Thousands of workers rely on the exceptional cut protection of Kevlar® to get them safely through their workdays.
See how Kevlar® can help keep you safe - get started NOW with the new DuPont™ SafeSPEC™ glove selector tool. (copy the web address into your web browser.)
http://protectiontechnologies.dupont.com/safespec-selector-tools,
Please let us know if you have additional questions.
DuPont Protection Solutions
